lead_paragraph: The IOC approved the entry of 271 Russian athletes for the Rio de Janeiro Olympics on Thursday, meaning 70 percent of the country's original team will compete after a doping scandal that has dominated the buildup to the games.

headline.print_headline: IOC Approves Entry of 271 Russian Athletes for Rio Games
headline.main: IOC Approves Entry of 271 Russian Athletes for Rio Games
